|brand = Acelink |model = BR-6774 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = AD |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AD7200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8065; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v7-A |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- 1.7 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = WiGig, MU-MIMO, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ad
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/05/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07JKPDP63 |asin_country = JP |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA6320; |rad3chip2 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA6310; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 1 |rad3rxchains = 1 |rad3sstreams = 1 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11ad |rad3ad = 4620 |rad3freq = 60
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== <small> ===Wireless Features=== * Comply 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ad, supporting ultra high-speed zones â€“ as 4.6Gbps. * Supports 2.4GHz, 5GHz and 60GHz wireless networks connection simultaneously. * Support 4T4R MIMO technology in 5GHz frequency and 4T4R MIMO technology in :2.4GHz frequency, enhancing the performance and coverage range significantly. * Support 64/128-bit WEP, WPA and WPA2 securities and also 802.1x authentication. * High speed transmit and receive data rate - 1750Mbps while operating in 802.11ac :(5GHz, 80/160MHz) mode and 800Mbps while operating in 802.11n (2.4GHz) mode. :Supported Data Rate: MCS0, MCS1 (385Mbps) ~ MCS12 (4.6Gbps). * Supports WPS function for easy wireless association. </small> ===Specifications=== *Product: WLAN Concurrent Tri-Band Gigabit Router *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 @1.7GHz Dual Core Internet Processor *WLAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 (2.4GHz) + QCA9984 (5GHz) :AD: QCA6320 (60GHz MAC/BB) + QCA6310 (60GHz RF transceiver) *MIMO Technology: 5GHz: 4T4R MIMO, 2.4GHz: 4T4R MIMO *Antenna: 4x 3dBi Dual Band external dipole antenna : 1x 3-dimensional 32-antenna-element array (60GHz) *Flash: 128MB NAND Flash *RAM: 512MB DDR3 SDRAM *Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 Gigabit Switch *Port: USB: 2x USB3.0 :WAN: 1x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps) Auto-MDI/MDI-X UTP Port :LAN: 4x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps) Auto-MDI/MDI-X UTP Port *Power: 12V, 4A Switch Power Adapter *Dimension: 202mm x 208.5mm x 50mm (HxWxD) excluding antenna
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2016/01/05/qualcomm-80211ad-products-lead-way-multi-band-wi-fi-ecosystem ''Qualcomm 802.11ad Products for Multi-band Wi-Fi Ecosystem'' on '''Qualcomm'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32915-tp-link-ces-2016-announcements ''TP-LINK CES 2016 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*[[TP-LINK AD7200 (Talon)]] - ''AD7200 Multi-band Wi-Fi Router'' (802.11ac/ad) ::4620Mbps (60GHz) / 1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz) (AC2600) ::AC2600 4x4 [[Qualcomm]] MU-MIMO with single-stream 802.11ad radio ::[[Qualcomm]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, 2x USB 3.0 ports, 8x ext. antennas
==See also== *[[List of 802.11ad Hardware]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]]
*[[TP-LINK AD7200 (Talon)]]
